triples.name: Diplomacy (game)
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the task of achieving human-level play in the complex multi-player strategy game Diplomacy.

triples.name: Language model
triples.relevance: Cicero integrates a language model as a core component to enable natural language communication between players.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper applies reinforcement learning algorithms to optimize Cicero's strategic decision-making.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: Planning algorithms are used to develop Cicero's long-term strategies and coordinate multi-step tactics.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP is essential for Cicero to parse player communications and generate strategic dialogue.

triples.name: Cicero
triples.relevance: Cicero is the novel AI agent proposed in this paper that achieves human-level performance in Diplomacy through integrated language and strategic reasoning.
